name: Bunny's Revenge
description:
Bunny's Revenge is a retro, Gameboy-style top-down 2D game developed for the Design Buddies Game Jam (Dec 10-17 2021).

Story:

SEQUEL TO LAST YEARS GAME JAM SUBMISSION "BUNNY PARTY"

Bunny always helps everyone in town by harvesting food, getting parties ready, and defending the town from crows and turnips. However, no one ever wants to help Bunny. 

Bunny will no longer stand for this!

Armed with Carrot Swords and Throwing Starfruits, Bunny descends upon the town, hungry for revenge!

Team:

Abena OA (rhythmsafox#9868) - Logic, Documentation.

Eve CM (eve#5915) - Art & Assets + some Logic.

Controls:

To start the game press Enter/Return.

Check in-game control menu via Shift button.

 Players control Bunny using the arrow keys or WASD. 

Attack enemies with treasured food weapons:

Carrot Sword  via A (Alt, Z, J) button and

Throwing Starfruits via B (Control, K, X) button.

Interact with cats and treasure chests via via A (Alt, Z, J) button.

Source:

The game was built using GBStudio 3.0 by Chris Maltby ( https://www.gbstudio.dev/ ). Credits can be viewed in the .txt file
